name: Sherron Ostrander
text:
I had the "Special" sandwich and it was wonderful. Every ingredient was fresh and the bread was soft inside and crispy outside.  Tasted like heaven!

I also had mango bubble tea and it was equally wonderful.

Great service, friendly people. I will definitely be stopping in again

name: Ryan F
text:
This place is great. The sandwich's are really good and the price is too good to be true. Get a sandwich, drink, and a bag of chips for $5. It's better than subway hands down. They've also got bubble tea but these may be commercial and not made there. I'm not sure because I've never had one, it's not really my thing. I've had their Spring Rolls and was impressed. The workers are really nice and friendly. Restaurant is a little small but I usually grab something to go. Also it's clean which isn't always a big deal but for me it is.

Give it a shot and I know you'll not regret it. Everyone I've either taken there or told to go there has said it's really good.

name: Craig Noneman
text: The "special" sandwich was really delicious and unique (never had a Vietnamese sandwich before) and only cost $3.75, also loved the Vietnamese coffee. Next time I'm going to try the pork sandwich and bubble tea, and I definitely plan on going back soon

name: Samantha Roberge
text: Best Bahn mi sandwich place in Alabama! Bubble tea is also great. Wish we had this place in Birmingham! We eat here every time we come to Huntsville and have never been disappointed!

name: Josh Lang
text:
This place rocks. My wife kept dodging because she thought the name Viet Sandwich was weird. I finally had to use the Father's Day overruling to go and everyone loved it.

We had the special sandwich, boba tea, and the fresh spring rolls. I was surprised by the crusty, fresh bread on the sandwich. Everything was delicious.

name: Eddie Reyes
text: This place is the best, from the pork sandwich to the spring rolls and to the bubble tea. This is the only place with the best bubble tea in Madison or Huntsville. I Highly recommend this place.

name: Frank Kotora
text:
This place is absolutely legit. They know what they are doing and I very highly recommend checking them out. With extremely positive word-of-mouth and online reviews, chances are you will LOVE this place as much as I did if you are looking to try out some new and interesting food that will hopefully blow both your mind and your taste buds without breaking your bank.

I heard about these friendly folks and their amazingly delicious sandwiches a few years ago back when they were operating out of a food truck setup at a gas station. For some reason I never gave them shot, and now I highly regret only just recently getting around to trying it out because of all the times in the past couple years that I could have thrown down a couple bucks for one of these delectable flavor bombs instead of wasting money on all the typical and usually regrettable fast food.

I stumbled across these guys again the other day online and all the positive reviews out there just confirmed what I had heard before and got me and my wife through their door that very same day. They now operate out of a small but pleasant little shop in a standard shopping center. My wife and I ordered and split the Banh Mi "Special" and the Grilled Pork sandwiches, Shrimp and Pork spring rolls, with a Mango Bubble Tea. Everything was almost shockingly tasty, the flavors were fresh, crisp, clean, savory, bold, balanced, and just straight up delicious. The service was super quick and the young couple that owns it were kind and happy people genuinely looking to make sure we enjoyed everything and had everything we needed. Lastly, this place is CHEAP...unbelievably cheap for the quality and portion-size. Simply cannot be beat. I was compelled to add an online review myself considering how much I enjoyed it.

We will for sure be back, and if you have not been yet, do yourself a favor and go there as soon as you are hungry. Today if possible. If you are hungry at this very moment. Go there now. Seriously.

name: Grey Logan
text: Excellent sandwiches and soup. Wonderful service! I had the pork sandwich and my friend got the special. We shared and they were both soooo good!

name: Richard McCollum
text: Can't say enough good things about this place. Everything is great: the service, the food and the bubble tea!

name: Benjamin Davis
text: Excellent fresh sandies. Bub teas. Kind staff. 10/10 will dine again.

name: John Kaufmann
text:
What a great place.

We have been eating at chains all week on a business trip.  We so badly wanted to find a unique small resturant with good healthy food.  THIS PLACE WAS PERFECT.

We had the springrolls (shrimp, pork and chicken) and split a Chicken Sandwish Spicy.

Loved it - nice people and great food.

Check it out!

name: Ian Weston
text: Top quality food top quality people

name: Chris Lalo
text: Excellent food at a great value and very friendly staff!

name: Leon Kennedy
text: Stellar customer service, complex and interesting spring rolls and a savory peanut sauce. I had the spring roll and special sandwich.

name: John Wulff
text: Only boba tea place in Huntsville. The food is great and the place is cozy.

name: David Acord
text: Cheap and delicious. A winning combination.

name: Matt Varian
text: Great food, would highly recommend

name: Robert Nye
text: Special sandwich was great, and cheap.

name: Michael Spickelmier
text: Small station not much in the C-Store, but pretty good looking pho

name: Leesa Gentz
text: We found this little Vietnamese gem of a restaurant hidden in a gas station when we were driving through. Excellent food, super quick and friendly service and dirt cheap. They’ve only been open a few weeks but I hope that more people discover this ‘hole in the wall’ place because we absolutely loved it!

name: Ayumi Wright
text: We found this total hall in a wall place off the interstate. Yes you are eating in a gas station but they make their food from scratch like they would at home. NO MSG!!! We had a pho and Banh Mi and egg rolls. I would like the broth to be a bit saltier but our daughter loved it. Egg rolls were super crispy and good. Banh Mi was good as well. Oh and the blueberry pomegranate smoothie was amazing... EXCELLENT service and the owners were super sweet. We will definitely come back when we drive near the rocket outside of the Huntsville!!!

name: john Taylor
text: Great food at a fair price. The people who run this place are very friendly.

name: brooke rozell
text: The best bubble tea around ! Also you have the check out there spring rolls.  We used to drive to Huntsville for them and now we don’t have too

name: Tiffany Bingham
text: Their Pho is Amazing. We Will defiently have it again.

name: Masafumi Hirata
text: So good! I usually don't expect good food at mall, but this place is better than the other Pho places!

name: Kai-ning H
text: I come here whenever I can. I love authentic Asian food and Viet Kitchen is one of the asian restaurant I really like. It's my go to place whenever I come shopping at Galleria.

name: Ying Hu
text: The order was instant!! Took the chef 1 minute to put the pho on the counter! Very fresh!

name: Hannah Courtney
text: Took one bite and my life flashed before my eyes.  I’m so sad that I’m only here for the weekend, because this food is so good that I’m going to be dreaming of it when I leave :(((( delicious!!!

name: KBNJB _
text: Best sushi in all man kind

name: Jimmy K
text: Bomb roll fried and yum yum chicken! Really really good!

name: Michael Daw
text: Absolutely amazing and astonishingly fresh!
